UniprotID	Q4G0N4-3
Accession	Q4G0N4;B5MC93;Q6UTX5;Q96NM0
EntryName	NAKD2_HUMAN
ProteinName	NAD kinase 2, mitochondrial (EC 2.7.1.23) (Mitochondrial NAD kinase) (NAD kinase domain-containing protein 1, mitochondrial)
GeneName	NADK2 C5orf33 MNADK NADKD1
Length	279
Function	Mitochondrial NAD(+) kinase that phosphorylates NAD(+) to yield NADP(+). Can use both ATP or inorganic polyphosphate as the phosphoryl donor. Also has weak NADH kinase activity in vitro; however NADH kinase activity is much weaker than the NAD(+) kinase activity and may not be relevant in vivo.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar
